text: was a Japanese politician. He was member of the House of Representatives for the Social Democratic Party from 2000 to 2003 and 2005 to 2012. Shigeno died on April 9, 2021 from a heart attack in Tokyo, aged 79.元衆議院議員の重野安正氏が死去 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Ōita Prefecture Category:Japanese politicians
title: Yasumasa Shigeno
